name: Final Approach: Pilot Edition
description: Feel the wind in your hair and the roar of the engine in Final Approach: Pilot Edition! Grab your gamepad as you expertly pilot aircraft through treacherous landscapes, fly combat missions and solve various challenges in this seated, Virtual Reality action-packed flying adventure. You own the skies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: VR ONLY
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980ti Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: VR ONLY

reviews.review_text: Wow. I have to say I've only played a little bit but it is alot of fun. It's such a great perspective to play an already great game. I can't wait to finish this mode. Very great job team. Can't wait to see what else you come up with.
I had hoped the view was more first person but this is still a bit of fun if you want a sit down. Slower pace of play to the stand up room scale game.

Final approach - nah.  Final approach: pilot edition - oh yes!  Thank you for making pilot edition! It is a huge improvement compared to basic version of final approach in terms of playability and keeping interest going on. I love the way I can fly the planes, jets and helicopters as if I was flying RC planes, but much more cooler way and in fabulous miniature world! It is quite easy to learn to fly the planes, but all little tasks with the planes and at field keeps interest on. One of my favorite games on VR.  The only downside for this game is slight motion sickness which I develop especially at city airport due to jerkiness, but that is most likely due to my -not-performing-enough-graphics-gard. GTX970.
